TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed Collection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IList, class System.Runtime.Serialization.IDeserializationCallback, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public NotInheritable Class Collection Implements IDeserializationCallback, IList, ISerializable
public ref class Collection sealed : System::Collections::IList, System::Runtime::Serialization::IDeserializationCallback, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable

summary.span: Visual Basic 是已排序的項目集合，可作為單元來參考。

span.span: A Visual Basic is an ordered set of items that can be referred to as a unit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 可能的話，您應該使用中的泛型集合命名空間或命名空間，而非 Visual Basic `Collection`。Whenever possible, you should use the generic collections in the namespace or the namespace instead of a Visual Basic `Collection`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[集合](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e76533a9-5033-4a0b-b003-9c2be60d185b)。For more information, see [Collections](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e76533a9-5033-4a0b-b003-9c2be60d185b). Visual Basic`Collection`物件提供便利的方式來參考的項目為單一物件相關的群組。The Visual Basic `Collection` object provides a convenient way to refer to a related group of items as a single object. 項目，或*元素*中只需要它們存在於集合中的事實相關的集合。The items, or *elements*, in a collection need only be related by the fact that they exist in the collection. 集合的項目不必共用相同的資料類型。Elements of a collection do not have to share the same data type. 您可以建立集合相同的方式，建立其他物件，下列範例說明。You can create a collection the same way you create other objects, as the following example illustrates. ```vb Dim coll As New Microsoft.VisualBasic.Collection() ``` 當您建立集合之後時，您可以執行下列其中一項：Once you have created a collection, you can do any of the following: - 新增項目與方法。Add an element with the method. - 移除的項目方法。Remove an element with the method. - 移除所有項目與方法。Remove all elements with the method. - 找出多少項目集合包含具有屬性。Find out how many elements the collection contains with the property. - 檢查是否有與特定的項目方法。Check whether a specific element is present with the method. - 傳回特定的項目集合中具有屬性。Return a specific element from the collection with the property. - 逐一查看整個集合與[每個...下一個陳述式](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/for-each-next-statement.md)。Iterate through the entire collection with the [For Each...Next Statement](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/for-each-next-statement.md). > [!NOTE] > 雖然 Visual Basic`Collection`物件具有相同的功能`Collection`物件在 Visual Basic 6.0 中，兩個無法在 COM 環境交互操作。Although the Visual Basic `Collection` object has functionality identical to the `Collection` object in Visual Basic 6.0, the two cannot interoperate in a COM environment. > [!CAUTION] > 逐一查看 Visual Basic`Collection`不是安全執行緒程序。Iterating through a Visual Basic `Collection` is not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even if the collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, causing the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，請鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, either lock the collection or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 如需有關鎖定的程式設計元素的詳細資訊，請參閱[SyncLock 陳述式](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/synclock-statement.md)。For more information on locking a programming element, see [SyncLock Statement](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/synclock-statement.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立`Collection`物件`names`和對話方塊的使用者可以將物件加入 （名稱） 的集合。The following example creates the `Collection` object `names` and a dialog box with which a user can add objects (names) to the collection. 然後在集合中，顯示名稱並最後會將集合清空不需處置的`Collection`物件本身。It then displays the names in the collection, and finally empties the collection without disposing of the `Collection` object itself. 若要查看其運作方式，選擇 **加入類別**命令**專案**功能表，並宣告名的公用變數`instanceName`模組層級的`nameClass`(型別`Public instanceName`) 來保存每個執行個體名稱。To see how this works, choose the **Add Class** command from the **Project** menu and declare a public variable called `instanceName` at the module level of `nameClass` (type `Public instanceName`) to hold the names of each instance. 保留預設名稱為`nameClass`。Leave the default name as `nameClass`. 複製並貼上下列程式碼**一般**> 一節的另一個模組，並加以啟動的陳述式`classNamer`其他程序中。Copy and paste the following code into the **General** section of another module, and then start it with the statement `classNamer` in another procedure. （這個範例只適用於支援類別的裝載應用程式。）(This example works only with host applications that support classes.) [!code-vb[VbVbalrCollectionObject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCollectionObject/VB/Class1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 建立並傳回新的Visual Basic 物件。

span.span: Creates and returns a new Visual Basic object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式所傳回的 Visual Basic 集合是空的而且沒有任何已配置的初始容量。The Visual Basic collection returned by this constructor is empty and does not have any initial capacity allocated. Visual Basic 集合與不相容[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]集合中可用， ，和命名空間。Visual Basic collections are not compatible with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] collections available in the , , and namespaces. ## Examples 下列範例會建立新的 Visual Basic 集合，並將它指派給變數`coll`:The following example creates a new Visual Basic collection and assigns it to the variable `coll`: ```vb Dim coll As New Microsoft.VisualBasic.Collection() ``` 這`Collection`物件是一個為基礎，這表示，項目範圍是從 1 到的值的索引值`Count`屬性。This `Collection` object is one-based, which means that the index values of the elements range from 1 through the value of the `Count` property. Visual Basic 集合會保存類型的項目。Visual Basic collections hold elements of type .

MemberSignature.Value: public void Add (object Item, string Key = null, object Before = null, object After = null);
.method public instance void Add(object Item, string Key, object Before, object After) cil managed
Public Sub Add (Item As Object, Optional Key As String = null, Optional Before As Object = null, Optional After As Object = null)

param.name: Item
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 任何型別的物件，可指定要加入到集合中的項目。

span.span: An object of any type that specifies the element to add to the collection.

param.name: Key
param.span: 選擇性。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 唯一的 運算式，指定用來存取集合中這個新項目的索引鍵字串，藉以取代位置索引。

span.span: A unique expression that specifies a key string that can be used instead of a positional index to access this new element in the collection.

param.name: Before
param.span: 選擇性。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 運算式，可指定集合中的相對位置。

span.span: An expression that specifies a relative position in the collection.

param.span: 要加入的元素會放置在集合中由 Before 引數識別的元素之前。

span.span: The element to be added is placed in the collection before the element identified by the Before argument.

param.span: 如果 Before 為數值運算式，它必須是從 1 到集合之 屬性值的數字。

span.span: If Before is a numeric expression, it must be a number from 1 through the value of the collection's property.

param.span: 如果 Before 為 運算式，它必須對應到當所參考的元素加入到集合中時所指定的索引鍵字串。

span.span: If Before is a expression, it must correspond to the key string specified when the element being referred to was added to the collection.

param.span: 您不能同時指定 Before 和 After。

span.span: You cannot specify both Before and After.

param.name: After
param.span: 選擇性。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 運算式，可指定集合中的相對位置。

span.span: An expression that specifies a relative position in the collection.

param.span: 要加入的元素會放置在集合中由 After 引數識別的元素之後。

span.span: The element to be added is placed in the collection after the element identified by the After argument.

param.span: 如果 After 為數值運算式，它必須是從 1 到集合之 屬性值的數字。

span.span: If After is a numeric expression, it must be a number from 1 through the value of the collection's property.

param.span: 如果 After 為 運算式，它必須對應到當所參考的元素加入集合中時所指定的索引鍵字串。

span.span: If After is a expression, it must correspond to the key string specified when the element referred to was added to the collection.

param.span: 您不能同時指定 Before 和 After。

span.span: You cannot specify both Before and After.

summary.span: 將項目加入至 物件。

span.span: Adds an element to a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Before`或`After`引數必須參考現有集合的項目; 否則發生錯誤。The `Before` or `After` argument must refer to an existing element of the collection; otherwise, an error occurs. 如果兩個`Before`和`After`省略引數時，新物件加入至集合結尾。If both the `Before` and `After` arguments are omitted, the new object is added to the end of the collection. 如果指定，也會發生錯誤`Key`值符合現有項目集合的索引鍵。An error also occurs if a specified `Key` value matches the key for an existing element of the collection. ## Examples 下列範例會使用`Add`方法，將`child`物件 — 類別的執行個體稱為`child`包含`Public`屬性`name`— 至集合，稱為`family`。The following example uses the `Add` method to add `child` objects — instances of a class called `child` containing a `Public` property `name` — to a collection called `family`. 若要查看其運作方式，建立具有兩個控制項及設定其屬性`Add`和`List`。To see how this works, create a with two controls and set their properties to `Add` and `List`. 新增`child`類別定義和`family`表單程式碼的宣告。Add the `child` class definition and the `family` declaration to the form code. 修改`_Click`事件處理常式**新增**和**清單**按鈕所示。Modify the `_Click` event handlers for the **Add** and **List** buttons as shown. **新增**按鈕可讓您加入子系。The **Add** button allows you to add children. **清單**按鈕可顯示所有子系的名稱。The **List** button displays the names of all the children. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCollectionObject#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCollectionObject/VB/Form1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance void Clear() cil managed

summary.span: 刪除 Visual Basic 物件的所有項目。

span.span: Deletes all elements of a Visual Basic object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Clear`方法會將集合清空，並重設其屬性設為 0。The `Clear` method empties the collection and resets its property to 0. ## Examples [!code-vb[VbVbalrCollectionObject#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCollectionObject/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance bool Contains(string Key) cil managed
Public Function Contains (Key As String) As Boolean

param.name: Key
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 運算式，可指定要搜尋集合項目的索引鍵。

span.span: A expression that specifies the key for which to search the elements of the collection.

summary.span: 傳回 值，指出 Visual Basic 物件是否包含具有特定索引鍵的項目。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether a Visual Basic object contains an element with a specific key.

returns.span: 傳回 值，指出 Visual Basic 物件是否包含具有特定索引鍵的項目。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether a Visual Basic object contains an element with a specific key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Contains` 傳回`True`如果集合包含具有完全符合索引鍵的項目`Key`。`Contains` returns `True` if the collection contains an element with a key exactly matching `Key`. 否則，`Contains`傳回`False`。Otherwise, `Contains` returns `False`. 索引鍵的值比對時忽略大小寫。Case is ignored when matching key values. Visual Basic`Collection`可以包含某些具有索引鍵的項目以及其他項目沒有金鑰。A Visual Basic `Collection` can hold some elements that have keys and other elements without keys. 這取決於是否呼叫方法提供選擇性的引數`Key`參數。This depends on whether the call to the method supplies an argument to the optional `Key` parameter. ## Examples [!code-vb[VbVbalrCollectionObject#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCollectionObject/VB/Class1.vb#4)] 如果您想要使用其索引鍵的項目在集合中搜尋，請記得提供`Key`引數，每次呼叫`Add`方法。If you intend to search the collection for elements using their keys, remember to supply the `Key` argument every time you call the `Add` method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Count As Integer
public: property int Count { int get(); };

summary.span: 傳回 ，其中包含集合中的項目數目。

span.span: Returns an containing the number of elements in a collection.

summary.span: 唯讀。

span.span: Read-only.

value.span: 傳回 ，其中包含集合中的項目數目。

span.span: Returns an containing the number of elements in a collection.
Read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`Count`屬性來判斷中的項目數`Collection`物件。Use the `Count` property to determine the number of elements in a `Collection` object. ## Examples 此範例說明如何使用`Count`屬性來顯示中的項目數物件存放至變數`birthdays`。This example illustrates the use of the `Count` property to display the number of elements in a object in the variable `birthdays`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCollectionObject#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCollectionObject/VB/Class1.vb#5)] [!code-vb[VbVbalrCollectionObject#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCollectionObject/VB/Class1.vb#6)] `Collection`物件是一個為基礎，這表示，項目範圍是從 1 到的值的索引值`Count`屬性。The `Collection` object is one-based, which means that the index values of the elements range from 1 through the value of the `Count` property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed

summary.span: 傳回對列舉值物件的參考，這個物件是用來反覆查看 物件。

span.span: Returns a reference to an enumerator object, which is used to iterate over a object.

returns.span: 傳回對列舉值物件的參考，這個物件是用來反覆查看 物件。

span.span: Returns a reference to an enumerator object, which is used to iterate over a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [每個...下一個陳述式](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/for-each-next-statement.md)呼叫`GetEnumerator`取得集合的項目支援反覆運算的列舉值物件。The [For Each...Next Statement](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/for-each-next-statement.md) calls `GetEnumerator` to obtain an enumerator object to support iteration over a collection's elements. 通常會使用`For Each`...`Next`迴圈來周遊集合或陣列，及您不需要呼叫`GetEnumerator`明確。Normally, you use a `For Each`...`Next` loop to traverse a collection or array, and you do not need to call `GetEnumerator` explicitly. 如果您需要進一步控制反覆項目比`For Each`...`Next`提供陳述式，您可以使用`GetEnumerator`方法，以執行自訂的周遊。If you need closer control over the iteration than the `For Each`...`Next` statements provide, you can use the `GetEnumerator` method to perform a customized traversal. 以下是某些情況下，您可能需要執行這項操作。The following are some cases in which you might need to do this. - 您可以以返回至集合的開頭，並在完成前，開始反覆項目一次。You might want to return to the beginning of the collection and start the iteration again before it is finished. - 您可能想要跳過一個或多個項目不同的原因。You might want to skip over one or more elements for a variety of reasons. - 您可能需要周遊中間集合的項目進行變更。You might need to change the elements of the collection in the middle of a traversal. 在此情況下您必須取得新的列舉值物件，因為前一個失效。In this case you must obtain a new enumerator object because the previous one is invalidated. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用`GetEnumerator`擷取的所有項目`Collection`物件。The following example shows how to use `GetEnumerator` to retrieve all the elements of a `Collection` object. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCollectionObject#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCollectionObject/VB/Class1.vb#7)] `GetEnumerator` 建構並傳回列舉值物件，它會實作介面命名空間。`GetEnumerator` constructs and returns an enumerator object, which implements the interface of the namespace. 列舉程式物件會公開屬性和和方法。The enumerator object exposes the property and the and methods. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[每個...下一個陳述式](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/for-each-next-statement.md)。For more information, see [For Each...Next Statement](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/for-each-next-statement.md).

summary.span: 依位置或索引鍵傳回 物件的特定項目。

span.span: Returns a specific element of a object either by position or by key.

summary.span: 唯讀。

span.span: Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: Default Public ReadOnly Property Item(Index As Integer) As Object
public: property System::Object ^ default[int] { System::Object ^ get(int Index); };

param.name: Index
param.span: (A) 數值運算式，可指定集合中項目的位置。

span.span: (A) A numeric expression that specifies the position of an element of the collection.

param.span: Index 必須是從 1 到集合之 屬性值的數字。

span.span: Index must be a number from 1 through the value of the collection's property.

param.span: 或是 (B) 運算式，可指定集合中項目的位置或索引鍵字串。

span.span: Or (B) An expression that specifies the position or key string of an element of the collection.

summary.span: 依位置或索引鍵傳回 物件的特定項目。

span.span: Returns a specific element of a object either by position or by key.

summary.span: 唯讀。

span.span: Read-only.

value.span: 依位置或索引鍵傳回 物件的特定項目。

span.span: Returns a specific element of a object either by position or by key.
Read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`Index`的型別`Object`、`Item`屬性會嘗試將它視為`String`， `Char`，`Char`陣列或整數值。If `Index` is of type `Object`, the `Item` property attempts to treat it as a `String`, `Char`, `Char` array, or integer value. 如果`Item`無法轉換`Index`至`String`或`Integer`，就會擲回例外狀況。If `Item` cannot convert `Index` to `String` or `Integer`, it throws an exception. `Item`屬性是集合的預設屬性。The `Item` property is the default property for a collection. 因此，下列程式碼是相等的。Therefore, the following lines of code are equivalent. ``` MsgBox(CStr(customers.Item(1))) MsgBox(CStr(customers(1))) ``` ## Examples 下列範例會使用`Item`屬性，以擷取集合中物件的參考。The following example uses the `Item` property to retrieve a reference to an object in a collection. 它會建立`birthdays`為`Collection`物件，並接著會擷取這個物件代表的帳單的生日，使用金鑰`"Bill"`為`Index`引數。It creates `birthdays` as a `Collection` object and then retrieves the object representing Bill's birthday, using the key `"Bill"` as the `Index` argument. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCollectionObject#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCollectionObject/VB/Class1.vb#5)] [!code-vb[VbVbalrCollectionObject#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCollectionObject/VB/Class1.vb#8)] 請注意，第一次呼叫明確指定`Item`屬性，但是第二個則否。Note that the first call explicitly specifies the `Item` property, but the second does not. 這兩個呼叫上運作，因為`Item`屬性是預設屬性`Collection`物件。Both calls work because the `Item` property is the default property for a `Collection` object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`Index`的型別`Object`、`Item`屬性會嘗試將它視為`String`， `Char`，`Char`陣列或整數值。If `Index` is of type `Object`, the `Item` property attempts to treat it as a `String`, `Char`, `Char` array, or integer value. 如果`Item`無法轉換`Index`至`String`或`Integer`，就會擲回例外狀況。If `Item` cannot convert `Index` to `String` or `Integer`, it throws an exception. `Item`屬性是集合的預設屬性。The `Item` property is the default property for a collection. 因此，下列程式碼是相等的。Therefore, the following lines of code are equivalent. ``` MsgBox(CStr(customers.Item(1))) MsgBox(CStr(customers(1))) ``` ## Examples 下列範例會使用`Item`屬性，以擷取集合中物件的參考。The following example uses the `Item` property to retrieve a reference to an object in a collection. 它會建立`birthdays`為`Collection`物件，並接著會擷取這個物件代表的帳單的生日，使用金鑰`"Bill"`為`Index`引數。It creates `birthdays` as a `Collection` object and then retrieves the object representing Bill's birthday, using the key `"Bill"` as the `Index` argument. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCollectionObject#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCollectionObject/VB/Class1.vb#5)] [!code-vb[VbVbalrCollectionObject#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCollectionObject/VB/Class1.vb#8)] 請注意，第一次呼叫明確指定`Item`屬性，但是第二個則否。Note that the first call explicitly specifies the `Item` property, but the second does not. 這兩個呼叫上運作，因為`Item`屬性是預設屬性`Collection`物件。Both calls work because the `Item` property is the default property for a `Collection` object.

MemberSignature.Value: Default Public ReadOnly Property Item(Key As String) As Object
public: property System::Object ^ default[System::String ^] { System::Object ^ get(System::String ^ Key); };

param.name: Key
param.span: 唯一的 運算式，指定用來存取集合中項目的索引鍵字串，藉以取代位置索引。

span.span: A unique expression that specifies a key string that can be used, instead of a positional index, to access an element of the collection.

param.span: Key 必須對應至在元素加入集合時所指定的 Key 引數。

span.span: Key must correspond to the Key argument specified when the element was added to the collection.

summary.span: 依位置或索引鍵傳回 物件的特定項目。

span.span: Returns a specific element of a object either by position or by key.

summary.span: 唯讀。

span.span: Read-only.

value.span: 依位置或索引鍵傳回 物件的特定項目。

span.span: Returns a specific element of a object either by position or by key.
Read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`Index`的型別`Object`、`Item`屬性會嘗試將它視為`String`， `Char`，`Char`陣列或整數值。If `Index` is of type `Object`, the `Item` property attempts to treat it as a `String`, `Char`, `Char` array, or integer value. 如果`Item`無法轉換`Index`至`String`或`Integer`，就會擲回例外狀況。If `Item` cannot convert `Index` to `String` or `Integer`, it throws an exception. `Item`屬性是集合的預設屬性。The `Item` property is the default property for a collection. 因此，下列程式碼是相等的。Therefore, the following lines of code are equivalent. ``` MsgBox(CStr(customers.Item(1))) MsgBox(CStr(customers(1))) ``` ## Examples 下列範例會使用`Item`屬性，以擷取集合中物件的參考。The following example uses the `Item` property to retrieve a reference to an object in a collection. 它會建立`birthdays`為`Collection`物件，並接著會擷取這個物件代表的帳單的生日，使用金鑰`"Bill"`為`Index`引數。It creates `birthdays` as a `Collection` object and then retrieves the object representing Bill's birthday, using the key `"Bill"` as the `Index` argument. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCollectionObject#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCollectionObject/VB/Class1.vb#5)] [!code-vb[VbVbalrCollectionObject#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCollectionObject/VB/Class1.vb#8)] 請注意，第一次呼叫明確指定`Item`屬性，但是第二個則否。Note that the first call explicitly specifies the `Item` property, but the second does not. 這兩個呼叫上運作，因為`Item`屬性是預設屬性`Collection`物件。Both calls work because the `Item` property is the default property for a `Collection` object.

summary.span: 從 物件移除項目。

span.span: Removes an element from a object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Remove(int32 Index) cil managed

param.name: Index
param.span: 數值運算式，可指定集合中項目的位置。

span.span: A numeric expression that specifies the position of an element of the collection.

param.span: Index 必須是從 1 到集合之 屬性值的數字。

span.span: Index must be a number from 1 through the value of the collection's property.

summary.span: 從 物件移除項目。

span.span: Removes an element from a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當`Remove`刪除項目集合，它遞減集合的一個屬性。When `Remove` deletes an element from a collection, it decrements the collection's property by one. 它會減少`Index`先前接著刪除的項目集合中每個項目的值。It also decrements the `Index` value of every element that formerly followed the deleted element in the collection. 如果將元素加入至集合，而不`Key`，您必須使用其`Index`將它移除。If an element was added to the collection without a `Key`, you must use its `Index` to remove it. ## Examples 此範例說明如何使用`Remove`方法中移除物件從物件存放至變數`birthdays`。This example illustrates the use of the `Remove` method to remove objects from a object in the variable `birthdays`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCollectionObject#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCollectionObject/VB/Class1.vb#5)] [!code-vb[VbVbalrCollectionObject#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCollectionObject/VB/Class1.vb#9)] 下列四個呼叫`Add`方法，`Count`屬性包含 4，項目`"Bill"`具有索引值為 1，以及項目`"Pete"`的指標值 4。Following the four calls to the `Add` method, the `Count` property contains 4, element `"Bill"` has index value 1, and element `"Pete"` has index value 4. 下列第一個呼叫`Remove`，`Count`為 3，項目`"Bill"`刪除時，和項目`"Pete"`的指標值 3。Following the first call to `Remove`, `Count` is 3, element `"Bill"` is deleted, and element `"Pete"` has index value 3. 下列第二個呼叫`Remove`，`Count`為 2，項目`"Mike"`刪除時，和項目`"Pete"`有索引值 2。Following the second call to `Remove`, `Count` is 2, element `"Mike"` is deleted, and element `"Pete"` has index value 2.

[!code-vb[VbVbalrCollectionObject#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCollectionObject/VB/Class1.vb#5)] [!code-vb[VbVbalrCollectionObject#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCollectionObject/VB/Class1.vb#9)] 下列四個呼叫`Add`方法，`Count`屬性包含 4，項目`"Bill"`具有索引值為 1，以及項目`"Pete"`的指標值 4。Following the four calls to the `Add` method, the `Count` property contains 4, element `"Bill"` has index value 1, and element `"Pete"` has index value 4. 下列第一個呼叫`Remove`，`Count`為 3，項目`"Bill"`刪除時，和項目`"Pete"`的指標值 3。Following the first call to `Remove`, `Count` is 3, element `"Bill"` is deleted, and element `"Pete"` has index value 3. 下列第二個呼叫`Remove`，`Count`為 2，項目`"Mike"`刪除時，和項目`"Pete"`有索引值 2。Following the second call to `Remove`, `Count` is 2, element `"Mike"` is deleted, and element `"Pete"` has index value 2.

summary.span: 實作 介面。

span.span: Implements the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將元素複製到以相同的順序，以列舉值逐一物件。The elements are copied to the in the same order in which the enumerator iterates through the object. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`取自。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is obtained from the .

span.span: is .
is less than zero.
is multidimensional.

exception.span: -或- 來源 物件中的項目數目，大於從 到目的地 結尾的可用空間。

.method newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator ICollectionGetEnumerator() cil managed
Function ICollectionGetEnumerator () As IEnumerator Implements IEnumerable.GetEnumerator

summary.span: 傳回逐一查看集合的列舉值。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the collection.

summary.span: 實作 介面。

span.span: Implements the interface.

returns.span: 物件，可用於逐一查看集合。

span.span: An object that can be used to iterate through the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [Visual Basic、 C#][Visual Basic, C#] C# 語言的 `foreach` 陳述式 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `for each`) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 方法也會列舉值帶回至這個位置。The method also brings the enumerator back to this position. 此位置未定義屬性。At this position, the property is undefined. 因此，您必須呼叫方法，以將列舉值前進到第一個項目，再讀取的值集合的。Therefore, you must call the method to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 或 。 returns the same object until either or is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果超過集合的列舉值的結尾會位於集合中的最後一個元素之後和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於這個位置上，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最後一個呼叫傳回`false`，是未定義。If the last call to returns `false`, is undefined. 若要再次將 設定為集合的第一個元素，您可以在呼叫 之後，接著呼叫 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果對集合進行變更，例如加入、修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，且其行為未定義。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization.

summary.span: 實作 介面。

span.span: Implements the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`index`等於中的項目數物件，然後`value`附加至結尾。If `index` equals the number of items in the object, then `value` is appended to the end. 在連續項目的集合 (例如清單) 中，後面接著插入點的項目會向下移動以容納新項目。In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element. 如果集合具有索引，則移動之項目的索引也會更新。If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated. 集合的項目若在概念上群組成 Bucket (例如雜湊資料表)，則不適用這項行為。This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table.

exception.span: 不是 物件中的有效索引。

span.span: is not a valid index in the object.
The object is read-only.

param.name: value
param.span: 要從 物件中移除的 。

summary.span: 從 物件中移除第一次出現的特定物件。

span.span: Removes the first occurrence of a specific object from the object.

summary.span: 實作 介面。

span.span: Implements the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在相鄰元素的集合中，例如清單，接在移除的元素之後的元素會向上移動以佔用空出的位置。In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot. 如果集合具有索引，則移動之項目的索引也會更新。If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated. 集合的項目若在概念上群組成 Bucket (例如雜湊資料表)，則不適用這項行為。This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table. 如果`value`中找不到物件物件維持不變，並擲回任何例外狀況。If `value` is not found in the object, the object remains unchanged and no exception is thrown.

span.span: The object is read-only.

exception.span: -或- 物件具有固定的大小。

span.span: -or- The object has a fixed size.
